title: Spyrix Personal Monitor Keylogger 11.1.3 !{Latest}
description:
Spyrix Personal Monitor Keylogger 11.1.3 !{Latest}

Spyrix Personal Monitor is a powerful multifunctional program for detailed monitoring of the activity of PC users.

Spyrix Personal Monitor works in stealth mode and allows you to control keystrokes - keylogger, take screenshots (screenshots), snapshots from a webcam, monitor activity: on social networks VKontakte, Odnoklassniki,in chat rooms (Skype, ICQ, etc.), in the search engines Yandex, Google and much more.

Key features of Spyrix Personal Monitor:
• Remote monitoring through a secure web account. Monitor activity on your computer through a secure web account by logging on remotely from any computer.

This means that you can control your computer without having physical access to it.

• Keylogger (recording keystrokes). With the help of the keylogger you can see all the keystrokes that are made on the computer, even if they were deleted.

• Screenshots (screenshots). Recording screenshots of the desktop and application windows.
• Live-mode. View the computer screen in real time (available for PRO license)
• Not detected by antivirus software. Unlike other applications, this program can not be detected by antiviruses, which can block it.

The monitoring system has special algorithms that prevent its detection.
• Remote uninstall. You can remove Spyrix Personal Monitor on the desired computer remotely - via a web account
• Control the clipboard. The program monitors and records all the information that the user copies to the clipboard.
• Monitoring of activity in social networks. The program tracks and records all activity in such social networks as Vkontakte, Odnoklassniki, My World,Twitter etc.
• Skype (two-way interception of a chat)
